creator: apa3a@yahoo.com
text:
The tar task documentation shows following example:

<tar dest="release.tar.gz" compress="gzip">
  <zipfileset src="release.zip"/>
</tar>

The task has attribute "destfile" instead of "dest", "compression" instead of
"compress"

creator: jan@materne.de
text:
Fixed that, thanks for the hint.

There were other errors, too ;)
